text: Then You Can Come Back To Me is a World War I song written and composed by Wolfe Gilbert & Anatol Friedland. The song was first published in 1918 by Gilbert & Friedland, Inc., in New York, NY. The sheet music cover depicts silhouetted soldiers marching with pennants labeled Peace, Victory, and Democracy. The sheet music can be found at the Pritzker Military Museum & Library.Gilbert, L.
